name: collect big coins
description: This is a puzzle platformer made in the last couple hours of the Mottzy Jammy Jam! Why did I do it? For Mottzy of course. Every time you pick up a coin you get bigger, which can be a blessing and a curse. A and D keys to move, space to jump, R to restart, and you can double jump. By the way I am walekdevy in twitch.
